titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 2587) making appropriations for the government of the District of Columbia and other activities chargeable in whole or in part against revenues of said District for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2000, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 106-310, by Mr. Linder.
Rule provides for consideration of the conference report to H.R. 2587 with 1 hour of general debate.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 105.

bill.summary: 9/8/1999--Introduced. Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on H.R. 2587 (District of Columbia government appropriations).
